                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Matt is an elite ex-cop whose life has gone down hill since he was kicked off 
the Force. After a rough encounter with a mysterious henchman, Matt is brought 
face to face with his only chance at reclaiming his life and clearing his 
gambling debt markers. Only after he gets started on his new tasks does he 
recognize good guy from bad. Meanwhile Matt&#039;s love for his only daughter helps 
him battle one of his greatest enemies, alcoholism.
